advice_text: Rotate crops to prevent soil depletion and improve yield.
steps:
1. Plan crop rotation to include legumes and cover crops.
2. Avoid planting the same crop family in the same spot year after year.

advice_text: Use organic compost to enrich soil nutrients and promote healthy plant growth.
steps:
1. Prepare compost with a mix of green (nitrogen-rich) and brown (carbon-rich) materials.
2. Turn the compost regularly to aerate and accelerate decomposition.

advice_text: Monitor weather conditions and adjust irrigation schedules accordingly.
steps:
1. Use soil moisture sensors or weather data to determine irrigation needs.
2. Adjust irrigation frequency and duration based on plant type and weather conditions.
